vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of the 2021-22 Veterans Treatment Court Grant in the amount of $50,000.00 from the Texas Veterans Commission Fund for Veterans' Assistance (Grant No. GT-VTC21-019) for continuation of the South Oak Cliff Community Court to include the South Oak Cliff Veterans Treatment Court Project for the period July 1, 2021 through June 30, 2022; (2) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $50,000.00 in the 2021-22 Veterans Treatment Court Grant Fund; (3) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed  $50,000.00 in the 2021-22 Veterans Treatment Court Grant Fund; and (4) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions and documents required by the agreement - Not to exceed $50,000.00 - Financing:  Texas Veterans Commission Grant Funds
vote.description: Authorize the (1) acceptance of the 2021-22 Veterans Treatment Court Grant in the amount of $50,000.00 from the Texas Veterans Commission Fund for Veterans' Assistance (Grant No. GT-VTC21-019) for continuation of the South Oak Cliff Community Court to include the South Oak Cliff Veterans Treatment Court Project for the period July 1, 2021 through June 30, 2022; (2) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $50,000.00 in the 2021-22 Veterans Treatment Court Grant Fund; (3) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed  $50,000.00 in the 2021-22 Veterans Treatment Court Grant Fund; and (4) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions and documents required by the agreement - Not to exceed $50,000.00 - Financing:  Texas Veterans Commission Grant Funds
